doc.name: input-password
doc.synopsis: How to use the password field for input
doc.description: When using the password field, people cannot see what they are typing.
doc.example: <wsfield type="password" name="pass" placeholder="Type your password" required="required" />
doc.note: All attributes for a password input field are supported (like in this case : name, placeholder and required. Obviously never use form action="GET" when using a password field, always use POST.
